GSD.description:
tracing: Fix sleeping function called from invalid context on RT kernel

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.122 by commit 1788e6dbb61286215442b1af99e51405a6206762. For more details please see the references link.
